head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SYMMERS, WILLIAM GARTH

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SYMMERS, WILLIAM GARTH

block.p: SYMMERS-William Garth. 89. Of NYC, formerly of Greenwich, Ct. on August 16, 2000. Beloved father of Barbara Bancroft, Susan, Bradford, Ann Reed, Deborah Symmers & Benjamin Keith Symmers. Devoted grandfather of eleven, great-grandfather of five. A memorial service will be held at St. John's of Lattingtown on Saturday, August 19 at 2 P.M.
